partners.title: Become a Partner
partners.text: Looking for a reliable partner in the paint sales industry? Join us! We offer high-quality products, favorable cooperation terms, and support at all stages. Be part of a successful business and reach new heights with us! Contact us to discuss partnership details.

hero_section.title: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the trademark 'REMALUX' – high European quality at an affordable price.
hero_section.description: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the trademark 'REMALUX' is a leader in the production of paint and varnish materials, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer consumers a wide range of high-quality paints, manufactured under a British license from raw materials of renowned French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American producers.

why_choose_us.title: Why do customers choose our products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted for their high quality, innovative solutions, and economical consumption. Add competitive prices and a variety of assortment, and you will understand why we are chosen again.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control, ensuring excellent coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative Production Technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technologies to create paints that are easy to apply, dry quickly, and provide rich colors.

economy.title: Economical Material Consumption
economy.description: Our paints offer high coverage, allowing for reduced consumption and cost savings.

price.title: Competitive Prices
price.description: We offer great value for money, so you can get a professional product at an affordable cost.

assortment.title: Wide Range of Products
assortment.description: In our assortment, you will find paints for any need – from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who is our product for?
for_whom.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the demands of the most stringent professionals for use in prestigious facilities. They are also perfectly suitable for ordinary people choosing materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything you need for perfect results
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paint and varnish materials with modern technologies and excellent service. All products are safe and meet European standards.

innovation.title: Innovative Technologies and Modern Production Methods
innovation.description: The production of paint and varnish materials at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and advances in chemical science, guaranteeing high quality and product safety at competitive prices.

service.title: Service
service.description: We provide pre- and post-purchase service, meeting customer requirements through high product quality and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide Range of Products
assortment.description: REMALUX offers textured coatings, water-based paints, varnishes, acrylic glue, and other materials. We will help you choose the right shade and guarantee high quality at competitive prices.

safety.title: Safety and Comfort in Use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, providing comfortable use for both professionals and DIYers. Our paints are safe for people and pets.

our_fleet.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
our_fleet.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the demands of the most stringent professionals for use in prestigious facilities. They are also perfectly suitable for ordinary people choosing materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.

download_remalux.title: Remalux
download_remalux.description: Visualize your idea with our app! Just point the camera at the wall and select a color, and see it come to life in real-time. A great way to choose the perfect shade and see how your interior will look!
